pages.title: Blossom Trees
pages.text: Blossom trees are an elusive tree species that can be found in many variants across the world. By default, you will find blossom trees in the following locations:$(br)- Frosty in cold biomes$(br)- Serene in swamp biomes$(br)- Warm in savanna biomes$(br)- Sweet in mountain biomes$(br)- Sunny in plains biomes$(br)- Fiery in mesa biomes
